info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 9:28PM CDT until April 8 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile AL
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...
Styx River Near Elsanor affecting Baldwin County.
For the Styx River...including Elsanor...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Styx River near Elsanor.
* WHEN...From late tonight to late Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Moderate Flood Stage. Water approaches houses on Donovan Circle in the Seminole Landing community.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 3.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 14.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued when updates occur.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING
